text: John C. Stewart was a Republican member of the Michigan House of Representatives from 2001 through 2006 representing a portion of Wayne County.2005-2006 Michigan Manual: State Representative John C. StewartThe Political Graveyard: Stewart, John C. Prior to his election to the House, Stewart was an attorney in private practice in Plymouth. He also served as a trustee of Plymouth Township for one term, from 1988–1992. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1949 births Category:Michigan Republicans Category:People from Wyandotte, Michigan Category:Members of the Michigan House of Representatives
title: John C. Stewart
